page.title: 14COMMUTING - REIGATE /REDHILL
page.content:
As the area has good links with London by both car and train, a{survey was carried out at{two local schools to see what proportion of children had {parents}who were{commuters.
At{Micklefield School}and{Wray {Common Middle School}a total of 378 children were interviewed. 235 of these had fathers who commuted to work, and 46 had mothers who commuted.
From 235 fathers, 134 travelled by car, 82 by train, 6 by van, 6 by motor-bike and 3 by lorry.
Out of the 46 mothers who commuted a total of 40 went by car, 5 travelled on the train and one went by motor-bike.
